site.title: Impulse Studio | Quality Solutions, Smart Pricing
site.description: Impulse Studio creates innovative digital experiences with cutting-edge web development solutions.

hero.title: We create websites that sell!
hero.subtitle: We design & develop websites and applications that stand out and drive results.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Modern solutions for your business at affordable prices

web.title: Web Development
web.description: From simple landing pages to complex corporate portals with custom design.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: We create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for websites and applications.

logo.title: Logo Design
logo.description: Unique memorable logos that reflect the values and character of your brand.

branding.title: Business Cards & Branding
branding.description: Full range of corporate identity development services for your business.

marketing.title: Business Promotion
marketing.description: Comprehensive promotion in search engines, social networks, and content marketing.

advertising.title: Advertising Setup
advertising.description: Effective setup of contextual and targeted advertising to attract customers.

works.title: Our Projects
works.subtitle: Get to know our latest works

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Our streamlined process ensures efficient collaboration and exceptional results for every project

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We begin by understanding your business, goals, and vision through detailed consultation. This phase involves market research, user analysis, and defining project objectives.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: We develop a comprehensive plan tailored to your specific needs, including content strategy, user experience planning, technology selection, and project roadmap.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our designers create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes that align with your brand and user expectations. We iterate based on your feedback until the design is perfect.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Our development team brings the designs to life with clean, efficient code. We follow best practices for performance, security, and maintainability.

steps.title: Testing & Launch
steps.description: We thoroughly test across devices and browsers, fix any issues, and prepare for a smooth launch. After deployment, we provide support and training as needed.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say about us

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the professionals who make your idea a reality

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.subtitle: Let's collaborate to bring your vision to life and create a digital experience that stands out

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear about your project. Drop us a line, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We create digital products that help businesses grow

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create innovative digital solutions that help our clients achieve their business goals and stand out from competitors.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We don't compromise on quality and always strive for excellence in every project.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches to offer modern solutions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in close collaboration with clients to achieve the best results.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We value transparency and honest relationships with our clients and partners.

items.title: Affordable Prices
items.description: We offer quality solutions at reasonable prices, suitable for small and medium-sized businesses.

items.title: Individual Approach
items.description: Every project is unique, and we develop tailored solutions that meet your specific needs.

items.title: Fast Turnaround
items.description: We work efficiently to deliver your project on time without sacrificing quality.

items.title: Post-Launch Support
items.description: Our collaboration doesn't end with the project launch. We offer ongoing support and updates.
